name: Weather Sense
description: Weather Sense is a modern weather app offering real-time weather data, clothing suggestions, and lunar phase insights. Designed with a sleek dark/light theme switcher and user-friendly components, it helps users plan their day with personalized recommendations. Features include Current Weather & Forecasts, Clothing Suggestions based on weather conditions, Moon Phases with emojis and visuals, Sunrise & Sunset and Dark/Light Mode toggle. Powered by public APIs (WeatherAPI/OpenMeteo/etc.)
